nodes.bodyText: Remove the comment; just leave the following line. Add a comment: "dynamic filter will be added through subfield pushdown"

commit.message:
Add session properties for dynamic filtering

Co-Authored-By: James Sun <jamessun@fb.com>
Co-Authored-By: Andrii Rosa <andriirosa@fb.com>

Introduce DynamicFilter placeholder and its builtin function

Introduce dynamic filter placeholders  Add placeholders in the query plan for
preparation of converting them into actual filters during runtime.
The placeholders live in the join node, scan filter node, and the pushdown filters
in Hive ORC reader.

Co-Authored-By: James Sun <jamessun@fb.com>
Co-Authored-By: Andrii Rosa <andriirosa@fb.com>
